A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The plot is simple and riddled with plot holes\, acting subpar and the script relies a lot on corny/overused lines that you’d see in a Saturday morning cartoon. If you are new to Star Wars you’d watch this movie and go “hmm that was ok” and quickly forget about it; if you were a longtime fan of the originals however this movie is another nail in the coffin of the creativity and imagination that made the originals the timeless classics they are (well minus the special effects of the old movies obviously). JJ Abrams and his crew do not care about the magic of Star Wars\, they are putting minimum effort in these movies and using the Star Wars name to generate easy earnings. :-(
